appName: Rally Racing VR: Xtreme Speed Challenge
displayName: Rally Racing VR: Xtreme Speed Challenge
display_name: Rally Racing VR: Xtreme Speed Challenge
display_long_description:
Rally Racing VR: Xtreme Speed Challenge delivers an intense rally racing experience built for VR. The game’s standout feature is its intuitive VR car controller, allowing natural steering & smooth handling that responds instantly to your movements. This realistic control system gives you strong sense of speed & true rally immersion

Realistic Car Physics & Interior

Authentic rally physics bring believable vehicle reactions on dirt, gravel, & rugged terrain. The detailed interior, stylish steering wheel, & digital speedometer enhance the feeling of acceleration and control.

Beautiful & Dynamic Environments

Race through long, visually rich environments including forests, offroad, & mountains. Each track supports day & night driving & multiple weather conditions, offering variety, atmosphere, & a deeper sense of adventure. Cheering crowds react as you race, adding energy to every stage

Exotic & Customizable Cars

Choose from multiple exotic cars, each with unique performance & visuals. Customize your vehicles with textures, & skins to create your own racing style. Every car feels distinct in both handling & appearance

Rally Challenges & High-Speed Action

Compete through checkpoints, technical rally routes, and rugged offroad paths. When you need a burst of speed, activate Nitro Boost to power through straightaways & gain an edge in intense moments

Start the engine, feel the control in your hands, & experience rally racing the way it’s meant to be fast, immersive, & real.
